channel.title: ::fcguide
channel.description: alright, as in ddsspeced. there was a ::fcguide and something came upp and it'll tell you what too do. im not sure how too say this, but i need the code for something to pop up, im trying too add ::pricechecker into my sever, and i don't know whatd be the code. if somebody can leech me ::fcguide, would be great. thanks

item.title: ::fcguide
item.dc:creator: @shockys shockys
item.description:
@shockys wrote:

the economy is great.
prices are staying at the range, and i’ve decided too make a ::pricecheck.
but i’ve forgot how too do a simple code…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2009, 05:34:49 pm[/size][hr]what do i do too make a new line?
i want too make that quest thing come up, had it say an ITEM then the price,
then a new line and etc.
what would the code for that be?

Read full topic

item.title: ::fcguide
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

public void priceCheck() { sendQuest("Close Window", 6967);//Close Text sendQuest("", 6968);//Line 1 sendQuest("", 6969);//Line 2 sendQuest(line1, 6970);//Line 3 sendQuest(line2, 6971);//Line 4 sendQuest(line3, 6972);//Line 5 sendQuest("", 6973);//Line 6 sendQuest("", 6974);//Line 7 sendQuest("", 6975);//Line 8 showInterface(####); flushOutStream(); }

Something like that? Than…

if(command.startsWith("pricechecker")) { priceCheck(); }

Read full topic

you should let the players decide the prices… that’s how an eco starts O_o
